objects.name: Explain
objects.string:
- Spacebar: Play/Pause          -  Arrows Up/Down: Add/reduce Volume               
 - M: Toggle Mute                     -  Arrows Left/Right: Forward/backward 5sec
 - F: Toggle Fullscreen

events.name: Click on volume slider, and drag
Initlialization : Create buttons for video player

events.comment:
Interaction with mouse and keyboard
Mouse clic and "m" on keyboard for muting video
Add and reduce sound with arrow Up and Down on keyboard
Spacebar and click on Play_pause button for toggle playing.

Interaction with mouse and keyboard
Mouse clic and "l" on keyboard for loop the video

parameters:
"Expression : " +
"volume : " + VariableString(exp_volume) + "%" + NewLine() +
"duration : " + VariableString(exp_duration) + NewLine() +
"current time : " + VariableString(exp_currentTime) + NewLine() +
"opacity 0-255 : " + VariableString(exp_opacity) + NewLine() +
"playback speed 0-100 % : " + VariableString(exp_playbackSpeed) + NewLine() +
"Time when click on timeline : " + VariableString(click_on_timeline) + NewLine() +
"Sc when click on timeline : " + VariableString(click_on_timeline_after_math) + NewLine() +
"Volume slider : " + VariableString(click_on_volume_slider_after_math) + NewLine() +
"Volume bg W: " + ToString(Volume_Background_ProgressBar.Width()) + NewLine() +
"pos click volume : " + VariableString(click_on_volume_slider) + NewLine() +
"Volume_percent_TEST : " + VariableString(Volume_percent_TEST) + NewLine() +
"looped: " + VariableString(exp_looped)

eventsFunctions.description: Set the position of a object in %, position is from the objet parent.
eventsFunctions.name: Place_pos_in_percentage
eventsFunctions.sentence: Place the object _PARAM1_ at X:_PARAM3_%, Y:_PARAM4_% from the object parent _PARAM2_, Include : _PARAM5_, Offset :  X:_PARAM6_ Y:_PARAM7_

parameters.description: Include or not the dimension of the object ? (0 = no ,1 = yes)
parameters.name: INCLUDE

parameters.description: Offset X px of the object
parameters.name: OFFSET_X

parameters.description: Offset Y px of the object
parameters.name: OFFSET_Y
